mapper.insert: insert into demo (id, name, create_time, update_time, REMOVED) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{removed,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select id, name, create_time, update_time, REMOVED from demo
